sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Modular Housing Buyer Protection Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Modular Housing Buyer Protection Act.

sections.heading: Definitions. As used in this Act:
sections.text: Definitions. As used in this Act:

sections.heading: State-approved modular housing units; state-approved seals; construction requirements.
sections.text: State-approved modular housing units; state-approved seals; construction requirements.

sections.heading: Application of Act. This Act shall apply to modular housing sold after the effective date of this Act.
sections.text: Application of Act. This Act shall apply to modular housing sold after the effective date of this Act.
